entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Muncho Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 p.m. PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow over eastern sections. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
